articles.description: Aman Sehrawat booked his berth in 57kg category at World Championships while Bajrang Punia decided to skip the trials.
articles.content:
Aman Sehrawat continued his ascend and booked a World Wrestling Championship berth after winning the men's 57 kg category trial on Saturday.
